summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE3D_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Type: const
Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_TEXTURE3D_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE3D_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: format
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the texture format.

param.name: width
param.para: Type: UINT

Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE3D_U_V_OR_W_DIMENSION (2048). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: height
param.para: Type: UINT

Texture height (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE3D_U_V_OR_W_DIMENSION (2048). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: depth
param.para: Type: UINT

Texture depth (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE3D_U_V_OR_W_DIMENSION (2048). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: Type: UINT
The maximum number of mipmap levels in the texture. See the remarks in . Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.

param.name: bindFlags
param.para: Type: UINT
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how to bind the texture to pipeline stages.

param.name: usage
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to.

param.name: cpuaccessFlags
param.para: Type: UINT
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies the types of CPU access allowed.

param.name: miscFlags
param.para: Type: UINT
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies other, less common resource options.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_TEXTURE3D_DESC structure.
